packages.description: The package or packages to update.

force.description: When false (the default), reports an error if installed packages are incompatible with the update.

next.description: Update to the latest version, including beta and RCs.

migrateOnly.description: Perform a migration, but do not update the installed version.

from.description: When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package from which to migrate.

to.description: When using `--migrateOnly` for a single package, the version of that package to which to migrate.

verbose.description: Display additional details during the update process.

packageManager.description: The preferred package manager configuration files to use for registry settings.
